column2: "Oh, it's you! You picked a good time to say hi! I'm in big trouble here! What am I going to do...?"
"A lot of enemies just showed up around the Halloween venue! If they stay there much longer, the event is going to be cancelled!"
"Everyone's really been looking forward to this! We have to do something! Please, help me!"
"Get some other ARKS together and go take out those enemies before they ruin Halloween for everyone!"
